page.title: 08An Adult's life-Blackheath
page.content: 0710 Radio alarm goes off. 0730 Up and dressed. 0750 Check Rebecca's spellings and Bryony's spellings. 0810 Take children to Liz Minton to take to school. 0845 Park car at work.Do ward round, checking in-patients. 0900 Cup of coff- ee,look at mail,start clinic in Dental Department.New patients - review oral surgery. 1210 Dictate to departmental medical secretary. 1240 Lunch. 1330 Start Consultation & Review Clinic. 1530 Check Accident & Emergency Depart- ment to see if any patients for me. 1600 Check department to see that every thing is put away,services switched off & notes ready for Monday. 1630 Home to garden & greenhouse. 1730 Take Bryony to ballet. 1815 Take Joanna swimming. 1920 Collect Joanna from swimming. 1930 Into garden. 2100 Supper,watch TV,read newspaper. 2330 Bed.
